title: Google Gmail Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Google Gmail for email automation and communication workflows

x-specs.title: Create Google Gmail connection with valid OAuth credentials
x-specs.given: valid Google Gmail OAuth client ID and secret from Google Gmail developer console
x-specs.when: user creates a new Google Gmail connection
x-specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

x-specs.title: Reject Google Gmail connection with invalid credentials
x-specs.when: user attempts to create Google Gmail connection
x-specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

x-specs.title: Update Google Gmail connection name
x-specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
